[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Bridgefields.jpg|thumb|300px|Bridgefields in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'']]

'''Bridgefields''' was one of the most easterly regions of [[the Shire]], lying within the [[Eastfarthing]].  Bridgefields was a stretch of about ten miles that lay along the [[East Road]] immediately before it reached the [[Brandywine Bridge]] and left the Shire. In the western parts of Bridgefields were the townships of [[Whitfurrows]] and, a little to the north, [[Budgeford]] on the Water.<ref>{{FR|Part}}</ref>  Budgeford was best known as being the home of the [[Bolger Family|Bolger family]], one of whom - [[Fredegar Bolger|Fredegar]] - played a part in the departure of [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] on his journey to [[Rivendell]].<ref>{{FR|I5}}</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:The Bridgefields is an area in the eastern part of the Shire around [[Budgeford]] and south of the [[Greenfields]].
